name: IrishCentral LLC
overview:
IrishCentral is the leading website servicing the Irish Diaspora throughout the world with a unique mix of Irish news, entertainment, travel, roots history, sports, business, culture, Pubs, craic and community.

Headquarterded in New York City, the company was founded by Niall O’Dowd in 2009. IrishCentral.com and its related entities; the Irish Voice Newspaper, Irish Emigrant Newspaper and Irish America Magazine are the largest publishers to the Irish community in America. For the past twenty-five years the company has been the leader in reporting on “all things Irish”.

Privately owned and funded by a leading group of Irish American businessmen, the company has offices in New York, Boston and Dublin.
